page.title: 20FARMS, IN OUR AREA
page.content: The farms in this area are{Redlane, {Foyles, Tanhouse, Bolthurst}and{Moat} farm. { Redlane}farm has existed for many years.The farmhouse is 500 years old.In this farm now they have only stables. { Foyles}farm has been there for 35 years.Cows and Bulls are kept on this 245 acre farm. { Tanhouse}farm was owned by{Mr. Baker from about 1940. He kept 4 geese that are now 35 years of age. It has recently been up for sale because the owner died. { Bolthurst}farm is still in use for cattle and sheep farming. { Moat}farm has a large pond which is near{Crockham Hill}and a house lived in by the owners. It has recently changed it's name to{Mecca}farm but is still known as Moat farm by locals.
